amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $213,000,000 for Other Procurement, Army, for the procurement of Up-Armored High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicles (UAHMMWVs).

action.text: Amendment SA 520 proposed by Senator Bayh.

vote.text: Amendment SA 520 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 39. Record Vote Number: 108.
